name: IronWalker
description:
The evil Xyon Corporation has become so powerful that governments quake in fear of it.
As a concerned citizen with a penchant for science and engineering, you have built the ultimate robot weapon and now it's time to topple them from their seat of power!

* Retro gfx
* Guns, guns, guns
* Weapon upgrades including rockets, lazers and homing bullets
* Weapons of mass destruction for when it all gets too much
* 4 levels of shootin' goodness
